meanings.definition: Relating to the magnetic properties of a spinning charged particle.
meanings.sent1: The gyromagnetic properties of the electron affect its behavior in a magnetic field.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the gyromagnetic nature of particles to understand their magnetic behavior.
meanings.sent3: The gyromagnetic dance of the particles in the magnetic field was quite a sight to see!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gyromagnetic whirlwind of thoughts, constantly spinning and attracting new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The gyromagnetic effect was so strong that it pulled nearby particles into its magnetic field.

meanings.definition: A constant that relates the magnetic moment of a particle to its angular momentum.
meanings.sent1: The gyromagnetic of the particle determined its magnetic moment in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The gyromagnetic was calculated to understand the relationship between magnetic moment and angular momentum.
meanings.sent3: The scientist jokingly referred to the gyromagnetic as the 'magnetic momentum connector'.
meanings.sent4: In the world of magnets, the gyromagnetic was the bridge between magnetic moment and angular momentum.
meanings.sent5: The gyromagnetic value was crucial in predicting the behavior of the particle in the magnetic field.
